com.redhat.rhn.manager.task

Class TaskScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.task.TaskScheduler

  • public class TaskScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskScheduler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskScheduler(Errata errataIn, Org orgIn)
      Create a scheduler that has both an errata and an org.
      TaskScheduler(Org orgIn)
      Create a scheduler that only has the org set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void runTasksByChannelNow()
      Gets all of the tasks which have been set by channel name, and updates their earliest attribute to now.
      void updateByChannels()
      This method inserts/updates tasks by the channels in an errata.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskScheduler

        public TaskScheduler(Org orgIn)
        Create a scheduler that only has the org set. This is useful for org-wide operations such as setting all tasks to run now.
        Parameters:
        orgIn - The org containing the tasks to be run.

      • TaskScheduler

        public TaskScheduler(Errata errataIn,
                     Org orgIn)
        Create a scheduler that has both an errata and an org. This constructor is for when you need to operate on tasks for an errata, such as updating the tasks for the channels in a given errata.
        Parameters:
        errataIn - The errata containing the channels you wish to operate on.
        orgIn - The org for the user

    • Method Detail

      • updateByChannels

        public void updateByChannels()
        This method inserts/updates tasks by the channels in an errata. This method corresponds to ChannelEditor.pm -> schedule_errata_cache_update method in the perl codebase.

      • runTasksByChannelNow

        public void runTasksByChannelNow()
        Gets all of the tasks which have been set by channel name, and updates their earliest attribute to now.
